DOC.criteria: Men woman , age ≥18 ≤70 year old Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥30 ≤45 kg/m² OR BMI > 27 < 30 kg/m² hypertension and/or dyslipidemia define : Hypertension define treatment antihypertensive agent mean systolic blood pressure ≥140 ≤160 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure ≥ 90 ≤ 105 mmHg Dyslipidemia define stable dose treatment statin , fibrate ezetimibe ≥ 6 week and/or triglyceride ≥ 150 ≤ 600 mg/dL , LDL ≥ 130 ≤ 300 mg/dL , HDL < 40 mg/dL Type 1 2 diabetes mellitus history MI prior 6 month history heart failure history symptomatic arrhythmia active hepatic disease document muscle disease history neurological symptom disease ( include limit tremor , ataxia , dizziness , neuropathy , episodes confusion , history seizure , stroke TIA ) know history major psychiatric condition ( e.g . schizophrenia anxiety disorder , dementia bipolar disorder define DSM IV criterion ) history depression suicide attempt ideation previous history surgical procedure weight loss ( e.g. , stomach stapling , bypass ) uncontrolled blood pressure
